Texts.Chs: 所以，事实证明，不管我们怎么想，把刀子绑在扫地机器人上并不能像我们想象的那样让赫舒开心。相反，每当“刺刀”进入房间时，他总是四脚着地，发出嘘声。其实这挺有意思的。
Texts.Eng: So as it turns out, despite how we expected, taping a knife to a roomba does not entertain Heshu as much as we thought it would. Instead, he always gets on all fours and hisses whenever 'Stabby' enters the room. It's actually pretty funny.

Texts.Chs: 刺刀造成了伤亡。它刺中了维纳利斯的脚后跟，而后者出其不意地用尾巴猛击它。安息吧，小刺刀。我们会为你报仇的。但可能不是用刀子。
Texts.Eng: Stabby had a casualty. It stabbed Vinalisj in the heel and he smashed it with his tail out of surprise. Rest in peace, Stabby. We will avenge you. Probably not with knives.
